translations: n.踢球；腿法；冲击力（kick 的复数）
v.踢；踢腿（kick 的第三人称单数）；反对

sentences.sentence: If he kicks me, I'll kick him back.
They set on him, punching him in the face and aiming kicks at his shins.
sentences.translation: 他们袭击了他，猛打他的脸，并对准他的胫骨猛踢。

sentences.sentence: Never walk behind a horse in case it kicks out (at you).
sentences.translation: 千万不要走在马后，它会踢你的。
